back_flavor: Chiaki Asami was born in the Japanese Province of Owari. Though happy with his simple life, it would soon be take from him by the great Minoâ€“Owari earthquake of 1891. Without an remaining family Chiaki immigrated to the United States, where he found himself settling down is the city of Arkham. Working from nothing, he would spend years founding his own company, set on creating a city like no other. It was only after some of his employees starting going missing and strange happening started appearing in the news that Chiaki learned the truth. If he didn't act now, Arkham would lead him to an early grave before he could see his plans for the city to completion.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, and up to 15 Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-2. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Foresight, Field Reports, Sleepless Nights, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Chiaki Asami
text:
You begin the game with Foresight in play.
[reaction] After an investigator performs an investigate action at your location. Place 1 supply on Foresight. (Limit once for each investigator per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Place 1 charge on Foresight for each point you succeed by (2 max).
I'll keep this city going even if I have to rebuild it from the ground up.

name: Foresight
text:
Uses (2 supplies) (Limit 2 supplies spent per round.)
[free] During your turn, spend 1 supply: Move a clue on your location to a revealed connecting location.
flavor: "I see a with a booming economy, zero unemployment, and smiling families. And If I must, I will remake this city twice over to see that happen."

name: Field Reports
text:
Attach to Foresight. Foresight gains:
"[free] Discard a card and spend a supply from Foresight: Choose a location connected to your current location, with at least 1 investigator and at least 1 clue on it. Move 1 investigator and 1 clue from that location to your location."

name: Sleepless Nights
text: Revelation - If Foresight has less than 3 supplies; shuffle Sleepless Nights into your deck. Otherwise, put Sleepless Nights into play in your threat area. Foresight's "[free]" ability can only be used once per round. At the end of your turn: take 1 horror damage for each supply on Foresight (Max 2 horror). If Foresight has no supplies on it discard this card.

back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, and up to 15 Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-2. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 3 copies of Family Bonds, 2 copies of Prying Eyes, 1 random basic weakness.
deck_requirements: size:30, card:1000011, card:1000011, card:1000011, card:1000012, card:1000012, random:subtype:basicweakness
name: Jack Myers
text:
Anytime a card enters your hand, place it as the right most card of your hand (Your choice of order for multi-card draws).
[reaction] When you play the left most card in your hand; Reduce the cost of that card by 1 for every 3 other cards in your hand (Limit once per round).
[elder_sign] effect: +1, if you succeed; draw a carc and you may move a card in your hand up to 3 positions to the left or right.

name: Family Bonds
text:
Fast.
This card does not count towards your maximum hand size. Ignore this card when determining your left most card in hand.
Move a non-weakness card in your hand up to 2  position to the left or right. Draw a card. Shuffle this card into your deck.

name: Prying Eyes
text:
Discard all cards that were to the left of this card when it was in your hand.
[forced] While Prying Eyes is in your hand: Increase the cost of the first card played at your location each round by 1.
[forced] At the end of your turn: move Prying Eyes one position to the left.
